metadata.dc:author: GARCIA DEL MORAL, J
FERRIS, M
metadata.dc:subject: TUBERCULOSIS, PULMONARY/therapy
metadata.dc:title: Nuestra experiencia con el p-aminosalicllato de la hidracida del ácido isonicotínico (dipasic), como tratamiento de base en 104 casos de tuberculosis pulmonar.
[Personal experience with hydracid para-aminosalicylate of isonicotinic acid (dipasic) as basic treatment in 104 cases of pulmonary tuberculosis].
